value.title: How we optimize Power Query and Power BI Dataflows
value.excerpt: Let's go into Adam's mind as he optimizes Power Query to make some Power BI Dataflows run faster to avoid resource usage. The result is INSANE AMAZING!  Power Query M function reference https://docs.microsoft.com/powerquery-m/power-query-m-function-reference  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Is a parameter filtered in Power BI Paginated Reports???
value.excerpt: How do you know if a parameter was filtered in your Power BI Paginated Reports? Was a slicer used in the Power BI report that is using the Paginated visual? Adam shows you a way you can find out!  Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.excerpt: Join us live as we talk about Power BI gateways! The what and why regarding them and some things to consider when using a gateway. value.title: Link from a Power BI Paginated report to a Power BI report
